lines.text: [Harry Doyle has been summoned by his parole officer]

I got a call from the rest home today. She said that you were being a disruptive influence during lunch. That you refused to eat your spinach soufflé, and that you caused a riot. And that last night you made love to a woman.
Do you make love to women, Richie?
Well, yes. Of course I do.
Then how come when you do it, you're a stud and when I do it I'm a disruptive influence to society.
Because I'm only 28 and you're 72.
I warn you, I know karate!

[points his shotgun at her]
I warn "you", I know Winchester!
How can you live in a hell hole like this? If I lived in a place like this I'd kill myself in an hour.
You've been here 45 minutes.

[on the radio to Yablonski]
We're running to Mexico!
Tell him to open the switches all the way, or we'll wreck the goddamn train.

[on the radio]
Open the switches all the way, or we'll wreck the goddamn train.
Let's wreck the goddamn train anyway!
I wanna get a hundred of those coppers.
There's only fifty Leon.
So? I'll shoot 'em all twice!
Well, Derek... Am I hot?
You're practically on fire.
Well, what do you want to do now, Archie? Steal another empty armored truck? Maybe start a collection?
No, we've got to do something big. Something they woun't laugh at.
Like what?
We could take down the flier!
The Gold Coast Flier? That's the stupidest idea I've ever heard!
That's what you said about the armored truck.
No, I said the armored truck was dumb. This is stupid.
I never thought the great Harry Doyle would turn into a gutless wimp!
Keep it up Arch, I'll put another hole in that chin a yours!
[last lines]
[Harry and Archie have crashed a train into Mexico. The federales show up]
Buenos dias señores. Put up your hands. I'm afraid you're under arrest.
[the federales aim their guns at Harry and Archie]
Eh, now wait a minute, wait a minute. This ain't fair!
No?
Señor, there's twelve of you and... just two of us.
Si?
A-and you got guns, and we got nothin'.
But this is how we put you under arrest señor!
Where we come from...
[points back to the US]
...they've got rules about making arrests.
Rules?
[Harry and Archie nods]
Si.
What kind of rules?
[Harry and Archie glance amused at each other with a "here we go again" look]
Well... for one thing...
[Archie kicks the captain in the crotch]
[from trailer]
[to the engineer]
Your train is being robbed.
You're crazy. Nobody robs trains anymore.

[comes up behind engineer and puts gun to his neck]
I'd say you've been misinformed.
What the hell are you doing here? I thought you was workin'.
I quit.
You quit?

Couldn't take it anymore. People treating me like dirt ever since I got out of jail. Sweeping out toilets, scraping crud off dishes, my girlfriend tryin' to kill me with sex - and I'm dressing like Bozo the Clown, just to fit in! I don't want to fit in anymore.
That makes two of us.
And I ain't goin' to your funeral!
You ain't invited!
[Archie has just landed a job at Penguin's]
What'll it be, sport?
Let me have strawberry yogurt. No, chocolate. No... Strawberry!
Look, kid... Just take your time, okay? Let me know when you've made up your mind.
I've already made up my mind.
So do you want chocolate or strawberry?
Neither. I want amarillo.
[Archie starts to get it for him]
Hey, that's GELLOTTI! I asked for YOGURT!

[peering at it]
I don't see any difference.
GELLOTTI is made out of CREAM! YOGURT is made out of BACTERIA CULTURE! Where were you raised, in a cave?
All right, all right...
[gets the yogurt for him]
... What, did I leave something out?
What about my toppings? You're supposed to ask me what kind of toppings I want.
Okay... What kind of toppings do you want?
Do you have peanut butter M&M's?
[Archie starts to put those on the yogurt]
Hey, what are you doing? I didn't say I WANTED m&m's! I just asked if you HAD them!
Yeah, we got 'em.
Well, I don't want 'em! Do you have Oreo pieces?

[holding those up]
You want 'em?
That's why I asked. And walnuts... NOT peanuts, WALNUTS. And jellybeans... NOT m&m's; I HATE m&m's... JELLYBEANS. And almond slices instead of walnuts.
[the sweating Archie brings him the completed yogurt]
Forget it; I'll just have it plain.

[forcing himself not to faint, Archie scrapes everything off the yogurt]
You sure you still want it?
Of course I do! What do you think I came in here for?
[Archie throws the yogurt in the boy's face]

[smiling]
You got it, kid. That'll be a $1.60, please.

[shouts across the diner]
Hey, Vince!

[annoyed]
What?
Where's Philly?
Pennsylvania!
No, no! Not "that" Philly! Philly the Mouse! Harry and Archie need him for a stick-up!

[after being in the sewer for days]
Goddamn Tunnel of Love! Well, don't you worry, Vinnie. A deal is a deal. Leon B. Little never quits. There's twenty-six stiffs out there who'll swear to that! Oh, daylight. All right, you chicken livers. If you're out there, you can kiss your future goodbye!
[comes upon a street gang listening to loud music]
Hey, Michael Jackson! Did you see two elderly gentlemen pass this way recently?

[scared]
Oh, shit! Another one!
[scampers off with his goonies]
What is it, my smell or something? Hey, fish-ass! You forgot your jukebox!
[blasts the gang's boombox with his shotgun]
I hate noise pollution!
Our colors are cherry, peach, lime, olive, and avocado.
I don't want to eat the suit, I just want to wear it.
Where are they?
Where are who?
Harry Doyle and Archie Long.
That's privileged information. I can't tell you.

[threatens to shoot him]
Oh yeah!

[closes eyes]
You can shoot me, but I still won't tell. Harry and Archie are my friends.
[Leon moves to filing cabinet and looks there. A moment later, Richie opens his eyes and starts to get up]
You'll never make it dip-shit. Sit!
Shall we?
Shall we what?
Shall we dance?

[Archie looks around and sees males dancing with each other, and suddenly realizes he's in a gay bar; he quickly leaves while the man makes an "oh well" shrug. Archie exits the place and runs into Harry on the street]

[to Harry]
You don't want to go in there!

[to Harry]
Now move along, before I arrest you and the bird.
There ain't nothing to steal on the Gold Coast Flier.
So? We'll steal the whole Goddamn train and ride it to Mexico.
What for?
To prove we can do it! It's the only thing that we'll have done to have worked out.
You can't do this!
Harry, I'm sick and tired of you telling me what I can do and what I can't do.
Archie, the Gold Coast Flier is no armored truck. It's a 70-ton train speeding at 100 miles per hour.
That didn't stop us the last time.
The last time we were 30 years younger and we got caught. We were put away for 30 years!
Now we're 30 years smarter. We woun't make the same mistakes.
That's right. Because we ain't gonna do it.
[after Leon is thrown by Harry and Archie off the Gold Coast train]
This ain't over you bastards! I'm gonna get you guys, even if it takes another 30 years!

[as Harry wrests his gun from him]
I'll kill you, man! I was only kiddin', Grampa! Let me go!
Grampa, huh?
What are you gonna do with him, Harry?
I'm gonna blow his head off.
No, you don't want to do that.
He was disrespectful to me!
But you just got your suit cleaned. You'll get brains all over it.
This punk don't have any brains.
Yeah. But there'll be blood. All red and sticky, *bleah*. It'll be messy.
Get a mop!
Okay...
[Harry cocks the gun and the robber faints]
These guys are in the wrong business.
They don't make crooks like they used to.
Call the police!
I did!
[Enter Yablonski; Belle karate-chops his arm and grabs his gun]
Call the police!

[grabbing his gun back]
God damn it, lady! I AM the police!
[Yablonski is eating a sandwich in his car spying on Harry and Archie when he gets a signal on his police radio]
1-Adam 27, please respond.
1-Adam 27.
Yablonski, this is Jarvis. What the hell are you doing?
Eating lunch, sir.
Bullshit, Yablonski! I know what you're doing, and if you're not back here in ten minutes, you're going to be eating your retirement dinner tonight.
Yes, sir.
[tossing his sandwich aside]
Son of a bitch!
You know, Arch, I never met so many stupid people in one day.
Ugly too.

[to Schultz]
Screw you!

[to Schultz's parrot after it repeats "screw you"]
Screw you, too!
[first lines]
I'm tellin' ya, Harry...
I know, I know. We could have got away with it.
Did I say that before?
Every day for thirty years.
I never met so many stupid people in one day.
I don't know how old you is, but you ain't getting any older.

[hears sirens approaching]
Uh-oh! Coppers.
[grabs nearby walker and starts to stand up]

[rushes up and helps Leon]
You okay, sir?
Yeah, I'm fine. I'm fine.
[after cop leaves, mutters]
Assholes.
[after learning that Archie and Harry stole an armored truck]
I can't believe you guys stole an armored truck.
Hey guys, that deal we we're talking about... *nice*.
[repeated line]
Whatever you say, Harry.
[in Harry's nightmare, Archie is about to hold the conductor up when suddenly he spins around and turns out to be Yablonski]
Once a thief, always a thief.
[taking Archie to a second job]
Look I know how you feel, but you can't go throwing yogurt into everyone's faces when you lose your cool.
We ain't gonna rob no train!
Ah, lovers' quarrel! It breaks my heart. Turn around, worm food! Start walking! And don't try anything stupid or you'll die right here! And don't let the goggles fool ya, buster! I'm a sharpshooter!
[They enter an alleyway]
All right, turn here! Turn! What the hell is this, a parade?
Where are we going, friend?
We're going up this alley, 'friend'.
And then what?
And then I'm coming out... alone.
[Harry and Archie move a construction barrier and Leon falls screaming down a manhole]
Come back, you bastards! Let's finish it once and for all! You'll rot! It stinks down here!
Finish it? Finish what?
You sure you don't know that guy?
No.
Damn it, I'm up to my knees in guck!
Could we be losing our memories?
I dunno. Could be, Harry.
I'm gonna get pneumonia!
Who the hell are you, anyway?
I'm Peter Pan. I've come to take you to Never-Never Land, okay? But you won't be comin' back!
You mind telling us why you want to kill us?
I'm Leon B. Little.
So?
Leon B. Little! Don't the name mean nothin' to ya?
No.
Do you at least know Vinnie Mendelman?
Yeah.

[to a reporter]
Thank God they know somebody!
Surrender's for wimps! I vote we die!
